resources.string:
Open AMP web page without AMP

When viewing a Google AMP web page in Chrome, use Share action and select this app to open that web page without Google AMP (using the default browser, not necessarily the same browser).

This works best on a page that Google has converted to AMP on the fly from a non-AMP host (e.g., mobile.nytimes.com, www.foxnews.com). Hosted AMP pages (e.g., amp.usatoday.com) cannot be directly converted to equivalent non-AMP pages.

Disclaimers: Use at your own risk.
This app is not affiliated with Google.
